title: My Portfolio
aboutGreeting: Hello there! I'm Kaushik, currently an undergrad at VIT Vellore pursuing CSE
projects: This Python-based chat application allows multiple users to communicate with each other through a single server - hosted locally or online

Blockz is a simulated UPI transaction system enabling secure user registration, login, money transfers, real-time balance management, and transaction history tracking to mimic real-world online banking
An interactive 2D platformer that allows players to explore and engage with my portfolio by roaming and interacting with objects
A real-time System Monitoring Dashboard built with Python, Dash, and Plotly, featuring CPU, memory, disk, network, battery, and process stats with a light/dark mode toggle
An AI model that learns through reinforcement learning to become a skilled game player, engaging and improving by playing with the user
A website developed during my internship at Paysharp
